name: Good Virus
description:
Controls:

Use the mouse left click to start the game.

Use the arrows to move the player and the spacebar to shoot.

Try to get a high score.

Join a virus that is designed to travel through internet and computer systems to destroy bad virus’s. The game is a very rough creation. The only playable level now is the player flying through a Ethernet cable destroying virus code before it reaches the main system. 

Hope you enjoy.
